prompt: Dark watercolor painting of a pale emaciated creature with large glowing eyes crouching alone in a vast misty underground cavern, surrounded by absolute silence. The creature has thin limbs and pale stretched skin. Dark cavern walls fade into shadows. Muted earthy tones with touches of pale gold light from phosphorescent cave moss. Moody atmospheric no text no logo. A tiny shimmering pool of water reflects dim light like lost treasure.
